sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Container, Row, Col, Card, Form, Button } from "react-bootstrap"; import "./Booking.css"; const Booking = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ fullName: "", email: "", phone: "", checkIn: "", checkOut: "", roomType: "Standard Room - ₹1,999/night", guests: "2 Guests", requests: "", }); const handleChange = (e) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); alert("Proceeding to Payment..."); }; return (

Book Your Stay

Fill in the details below to reserve your room at Maheshwari Nivas

{/* Left: Booking Form */}
Booking Details
{/* Personal Information */}
Personal Information
Full Name * Phone Number *
Email *
{/* Stay Details */}
Stay Details
Check-in Date * Check-out Date * Room Type * Number of Guests * Special Requests
{/* Right: Booking Summary */}
Booking Summary

Room Type

{formData.roomType.split("-")[0]}

Guests

{formData.guests}

  • ✓ Free cancellation up to 24 hours before check-in
  • ✓ Complimentary breakfast included
  • ✓ Free WiFi & parking
); }; export default Booking;
